Body:
for cosmo in cosmologies:
    simulation_model = batch.newModel(cosmology=cosmo, parameters=['Om',
        'Ol', 'w', 'si', 'ns'])
    for i, box_size in enumerate(box_sizes):
        collection = simulation_model.newCollection(box_size=box_size *
            simulation_model.Mpc_over_h, nside=part[i])
        fp = open(os.path.join(collection.home_subdir,
            'ngenic_matterpower_z{0:.6f}.txt'.format(0.0)), 'w')
        fp.close()
        map_settings = MapSettings()
        map_set = collection.newMapSet(map_settings)
        catalog_settings = CatalogSettings()
        catalog = collection.newCatalog(catalog_settings)
        for seed in seeds:
            ic = collection.newRealization(seed)
            pln_settings = PlaneSettings()
            pln = ic.newPlaneSet(pln_settings)
